Question
========
Why is it important to keep all files for a project inside the project/workspace folder?

Answerlist
----------
* It keeps paths consistent and makes the work reproducible for others
* It stops Positron from running code
* It prevents Git from tracking changes
* It makes it impossible to share the project

Solution
========
Keeping everything inside the project folder means paths stay relative and the whole setup can be shared or reproduced easily.

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False
* False
* False
